li.text: Select LowerAquiferBottom.shp (in the "My Documents\ModelMuse Examples\examples\data\Biscayne" folder) and click the
button. In the table at the top of the dialog box, check the checkbox next to ZVALUE and change the data set to “Lower_Aquifer_Bottom.” In the lower half of the dialog box, check the
Set values of elements by interpolation
button to import the Shapefile. Hide these objects in the same way as before.

button. In the table at the top of the dialog box, check the checkbox next to ZVALUE and change the data set to “Upper_Aquifer_Bottom.” In the lower half of the dialog box, check the
Set values of elements by interpolation
button to import the Shapefile. Hide these objects in the same way as before.
